working_directory_path.title: Working Directory Path
working_directory_path.description: Absolute path to the directory where Hindsight output artifacts will be stored.

hindsight_executable_path.title: Hindsight Executable Path
hindsight_executable_path.description: Absolute path to the hindsight.exe binary on the target endpoint.

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.description: File format for Hindsight forensic output (xlsx for Excel, sqlite for database, jsonl for JSON lines).

target_browser.title: Target Browser
target_browser.description: Name of the Chromium-based browser to collect forensic data from.

target_hostname.title: Target Hostname
target_hostname.description: Hostname of the endpoint system, used for naming output artifacts.

target_username.title: Target Username
target_username.description: Windows username whose browser profile to analyze. If empty, auto-discovers the currently logged-in user.
